name: Inca Trail To Choquequirao 4 Days / 3 Nights
description: This trek takes you to one of the last retreats of the Incas: Choquequirao (3.033 m). The Choquekirao complex is situated above the impressive Rio Apurimac Canyon. You will see spectacular scenery as well as Andean flora and fauna. Highest point: 3033 m.
